Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely these are poor. <S%H1800><s%> They are foolish; <S%H2973><s%> for they don't <S%H3045><s%> know the way <S%H1870><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> nor the law <S%H4941><s%> of their God. <S%H430><s%>

"How <S%H335><s%> can I pardon <S%H5545><s%> you? <S%H2063><s%> Your children <S%H1121><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, <S%H7650><s%> and sworn by what are no <S%H3808><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%> When I had fed them to the full, <S%H7650><s%> they committed adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and assembled themselves in troops <S%H1413><s%> at the prostitutes <S%H2181><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "Because you speak <S%H1696><s%> this word, <S%H1697><s%> behold, <S%H5414><s%> I will make my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and this people <S%H5971><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and it shall devour them. <S%H398><s%>

Behold, <S%H935><s%> I will bring a nation <S%H1471><s%> on you from far, <S%H4801><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> "It is a mighty <S%H386><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%> It is an ancient <S%H5769><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose language <S%H3956><s%> you don't <S%H3045><s%> know, neither understand <S%H8085><s%> what they say. <S%H1696><s%>

They shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and your bread, <S%H3899><s%> which your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> should eat. <S%H398><s%> They shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds. <S%H1241><s%> They shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your vines <S%H1612><s%> and your fig trees. <S%H8384><s%> They shall beat down <S%H7567><s%> your fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> in which you <S%H2007><s%> trust, <S%H982><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
"But even in those days, <S%H3117><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "I will not make <S%H6213><s%> a full end with you. <S%H3617><s%>

It will happen, <S%H559><s%> when you say, <S%H8478><s%> 'Why has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> all these things to us? <S%H559><s%>' Then you shall say to them, <S%H5800><s%> 'Just like you have forsaken me, <S%H5647><s%> and served foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> so you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> in a land that is not yours. <S%H776><s%>'
"Declare <S%H5046><s%> this in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and publish <S%H8085><s%> it in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H8085><s%> 'Hear now this, <S%H5530><s%> foolish people, <S%H5971><s%> and without understanding; <S%H3820><s%> who have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and don't <S%H7200><s%> see; who have ears, <S%H241><s%> and don't <S%H8085><s%> hear:

"But this people <S%H5971><s%> has a revolting <S%H5637><s%> and a rebellious <S%H4784><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> they have revolted <S%H5493><s%> and gone. <S%H3212><s%>

"Shall I not punish <S%H6485><s%> for these things? <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> "Shall not my soul <S%H5315><s%> be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on such a nation as this? <S%H1471><s%>
